explains: v. 是……的典范；举例说明

sentences.en: These are not qualities we now exemplify.
sentences.cn: 而我们现在倒没有了这些品质。

sentences.en: The plays of Wilds exemplify the comedy of manners.
sentences.cn: 王尔德的戏剧是风尚喜剧的典范。

sentences.en: These three pictures exemplify different sorts of evil.
sentences.cn: 这三张图展示了不同种类的恶。
